unnormalised: Hey everyone, payment gateways can be a lifesaver for online retail! I remember setting one up for my cousin Priya's saree business in Karol Bagh. Initially, UPI was enough, but now, with customers all over India, options like credit cards are a must. Finding a reliable one is key, otherwise, "Deewar" ban jaati hai between you and your money! Any recommendations? I've heard Razorpay and PayU are popular. Even saw some mention of ICICI Bank's offering.
normalised: Hey everyone, payment gateways can be a lifesaver for online retail! I remember setting one up for my cousin Priya's saree business in Karol Bagh. Initially, U P I was enough, but now, with customers all over India, options like credit cards are a must. Finding a reliable one is key, otherwise, "Deewar" ban jaati hai between you and your money! Any recommendations? I've heard Razorpay and Pay U are popular. Even saw some mention of I C I C I Bank's offering.
